A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too much comic relief. Finn’s character is annoying and a buffoon\, and his part of the storyline served no purpose. Rey and Luke’s storyline very good. Rebel storyline made little to no sense (Star Destroyers couldn’t catch up to the rebel ships until they ran out of gas? - they could outrun the Millennium Falcon in every other Star Wars movie!). Basically\, the writers of this movie sort of sucked. So disappointed. 2 1/2 hours could be scrunched into 1 1/2 hour good movie by removing Finn parts.
